hero.title: Transform your business using data-driven decisions
hero.subtitle: resolve is dedicated to create innovative and impactful data-driven digital solutions using the state-of-the-art technology of Sisense Fusion Platform.

why-data-driven.title: Why businesses should make data-driven decisions?

1.title: Enhanced efficiency
1.description: Make decisions based on data and evidence, not gut. Significantly reduce risks & improve business outcomes regardless of market shifts and competitive dynamics.

2.title: Elevated customer insights
2.description: Unlock insightful understanding to refine products and services to increase customer satisfaction. Increase product competitiveness & optimize marketing efforts as the result.

3.title: Improved risk management
3.description: Forcast and mitigate potential risks, enhance proactive business strategies & security.

about.title: About us
about.description: Founded in 2015, resolve Computing Services Co. Ltd. (resolve) is a niche data solutions company with a deep focus on data analytics and the application of AI/ML technologies. resolve is dedicated to creating innovative and impactful data-driven digital solutions. We aim to foster a sustainable community centered on your success and the advancement of your industry.

1.title: Data-Driven Digital Transformation
1.description: Transform your data into insightful analytics, ensure that your business excels in the digital age regardless of your current data source connection methods

2.title: Data & Analytics
2.description: Manage and leverage your data using powerful analytical tools, artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML), allow you to delegate tasks according to your unique requirements

3.title: Embedded Analytics
3.description: Seamlessly integrate your data analytics into your existing applications and maintain the look & feel throughout your applications without any adverse impacts

platform.title: How resolve can help businesses achieve data-driven insights

1.title: Seamless Integration
1.description: Help transform data into powerful data-driven analytics regardless of their original data sources while maintain data integrity including role-based data permissions and data security.

2.title: Customized Data Experience
2.description: Perform alterations and calculations with the help of AI/ML then display them using numerous types of charts and graphs available to provide helpful insights to make data-driven decisions as the result.

3.title: Infused Analytics Everywhere
3.description: Provide tools & technology including iFrames and SDKs to embed built data analytics to platforms natively to make users feel they are in the same apps.
